content: Wheat prices hovered near the highest level since mid-December as fresh tensions between Russia and Ukraine raised the risk of supply disruptions from the Black Sea region. Meanwhile, Russia said a drone strike damaged tankers, piers, a pipeline and storage tanks at its Black Sea port of Taman.
